tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I don't have words to express my gratitude towards Dr Indu. I had visited her for IUI pregnancy. She made my journey of pregnancy so easy. She is very co-operative and professional. She always cleared my doubts and handled me patiently. Today I am mother of a healthy baby boy and huge credit goes to Dr Indu. Thank you so much Dr Indu. I would strongly recommend Dr Indu for any infertility issue

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We went to Dr Indu for infertility issues, and hSG x-ray scan. We found Dr was very friendly and clear most of our doubts, we had a long discussion with Dr about our options etc. 

While coming to hSG x-ray scan it was done with great care under Anesthesia, we were happy with it. 

Regarding fertility, this hospital is very far, so we are already consulting other Dr nearby. But I get very positive vibes from Dr Indu, and found her very friendly and helping.

The nurses in cloud-nine fertility were also very helpful and co-operative. Our test was done hassle-free.

tags: None
review: Excellent experience with Ms Indu Madhusudan as a gynaecologist. She gives a patient hearing and answers all your queries in a friendly manner. She even suggested some techniques to keep the stress down. *** ******* ********* ** **** ********* **** ******** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: In Cloudnine, she is the first doctor whom we came across as pleasing  and ready to listen to our queries. Few of the doctors whom we consulted in Cloudnine have been arrogant and never merit any of our concerns, which is very disheartening.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
The doctor could have been more helpful over online consultation rather than being very rigid about ultrasound scan.  No information or help was provided.
If so then, there is no point of being available in Practo for online consultation.
reply_text: I understand your concern and your expectations. I too expect to see the patient one on one to understand better and give appropriate treatment. If the solution provided is investigation dependent then it needs to be done, even if it was one on one offline consultation . According to the law online consultation has a lot of restrictions. I wish to give needed and appropriate treatment as much as I can to all. I too intend to help online patients but boundaries are set bylaw. I need to work within that. I wish you good health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Good doctor...highly recommend and is patient friendly....hears the problem careful without hurrying

tags: None
review: Awesome experience.. very friendly doc....she will give complete time....will available for emergency always

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Indu, analysed my situation correctly and the 
the only treatment option she gave me was to reduce my weight and she directed me in the right dietician. Today I'm an expectant mother, only because of Dr. Indu's guidance. She is very friendly and a kind doctor. Her way of treatment approach involves very minimal medications and I really liked that a lot. I would highly recommend Dr.Indu.

tags: None
review: Dr.Indu has been the most approachable doctor I have visited. She addresses all the small and big doubts with equal importance. As my doctor she not only care for my physical health but makes sure my mental health is also fine and I am at peace which is very important during the pregnancy phase. The comfort level with her during my consultation is 10/10. I am glad that I was referred to her. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited for hsg test and it was done under anaesthesia. People who are afraid of pain should visit Dr Indu. She is very calm and did my procedure with utmost care. Everything went smooth. There was bearable pain for a week or so but then it went. Upon follow up Dr Indu was patient and explained well. Nurses are helpful and friendly, esply nurse Onama. She took care of me very well.
